To retrieve the details about a specific Sendible message, make a GET call using basic authentication with the user's Sendible username and password

====URL:====
http://sendible.com/api/v1/message.format?type=type

====Formats:====
xml, json

====HTTP Methods:====
GET

====Parameters:====
 * {{{message_id}}}: The message's id.

====Authentication:====
Basic authentication with username and password or <a href="http://sendible.com/api">api key</a> belonging to the Sendible user.
